languages.text: "Вот почему ты не доверяла мне раньше, так?"
"And that's why you didn't trust me before, correct?"
languages.original_text: "Вот почему ты не доверяла мне раньше, так?"

traits.locale_text: "And that's why you didn't trust me before, correct?"
"And that's why you didn't trust me before, correct?"
"And that's why you didn't trust me before, correct?"
"And that's why you didn't trust me before, correct?"
"And that's why you didn't trust me before, correct?"

languages.text: “这就是你之前不信任我的原因，是吗？”
languages.original_text: "And that's why you didn't trust me before, correct?"

traits.locale_text: “这就是你之前不信任我的原因，是吗？”

languages.text: «Por eso no confiaba en mí antes, ¿verdad?».
languages.original_text: "And that's why you didn't trust me before, correct?"

traits.locale_text: «Por eso no confiaba en mí antes, ¿verdad?».

languages.text: 「それ故に、以前は{mf|俺|私}を信用していなかったのだな？」
languages.original_text: "And that's why you didn't trust me before, correct?"

traits.locale_text: 「それ故に、以前は{mf|俺|私}を信用していなかったのだな？」

languages.text: "Und deshalb habt Ihr mir bislang nicht vertraut, korrekt?"
languages.original_text: "And that's why you didn't trust me before, correct?"

traits.locale_text: "Und deshalb habt Ihr mir bislang nicht vertraut, korrekt?"

languages.text: « C'est donc pour cette raison que vous ne me faisiez pas confiance jusqu'ici ? »
languages.original_text: "And that's why you didn't trust me before, correct?"

traits.locale_text: « C'est donc pour cette raison que vous ne me faisiez pas confiance jusqu'ici ? »

languages.text: "Bana önceden güvenmemenin de sebebi buydu, haksız mıyım?"
languages.original_text: "And that's why you didn't trust me before, correct?"

traits.locale_text: "Bana önceden güvenmemenin de sebebi buydu, haksız mıyım?"
